external_references.description: L. O'Donnell. (2019, March 3). RSAC 2019: New Operation Sharpshooter Data Reveals Higher Complexity, Scope. Retrieved September 26, 2022.

description: During [Operation Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0013), threat actors leveraged embedded shellcode to inject a downloader into the memory of Word.(Citation: Threatpost New Op Sharpshooter Data March 2019)
